queryMap.query: SELECT /* rsm4041_s01 */ NVL(MAX(MEET_CD),'999') AS MEET_CD, DECODE(NVL(MAX(MEET_CD),'999'),'003','경정','001','경륜') AS MEET_NM, NVL(MAX(RACE_DAY),?) AS RACE_DAY -- 0:RACE_DAY FROM ( SELECT DECODE( MEET_CD,'003','003','001') AS MEET_CD, MAX(RACE_DAY) AS RACE_DAY FROM VW_SDL_INFO WHERE RACE_DAY = ? -- 1:RACE_DAY GROUP BY MEET_CD )

SELECT /* rsm4041_s02 */ TYPE_NO, CASE WHEN TYPE_NO='1' THEN '경주권' WHEN TYPE_NO='2' THEN '구매권' WHEN TYPE_NO='3' THEN 'IW구매권' END TYPE_NM, SELL_CD, CASE WHEN SELL_CD='01' THEN '경륜' WHEN SELL_CD='02' THEN '창원' WHEN SELL_CD='03' THEN '경정 신시스템' WHEN SELL_CD='04' THEN '부산' WHEN SELL_CD='08' THEN '경정 구시스템' WHEN SELL_CD='09' THEN '경정 장외지점' END SELL_NM, -- 경주권 SUM(NOTYET_TOT_AMT) NOTYET_TOT_AMT, -- 전회불 총액 SUM(CYCLE_AMT+BOAT_AMT) CRA_MRA, -- 당일 지급액 SUM(END_AMT) END_AMT, -- 시효만료 SUM(NOTYET_AMT) NOTYET_AMT, -- 당일 미지급액 SUM(GITA_AMT1) GITA_AMT1, -- 환급관련 기타소득세 SUM(GITA_AMT2) GITA_AMT2, -- 환급관련 주민세 SUM(NOTYET_TOT_AMT-CYCLE_AMT-BOAT_AMT-END_AMT-GITA_AMT1-GITA_AMT2+NOTYET_AMT) NOTYET_SUB_AMT, -- 이월 미지급액 SUM(IW_AMT) IW_AMT, SUM(CYCLE_AMT) CYCLE_AMT, -- 경륜지급 SUM(BOAT_AMT) BOAT_AMT -- 경정지급 FROM TBJI_PC_BALANCE -- 밸런스조회 WHERE 1=1 AND RACE_DAY = ? -- 0:RACE_DAY 경주일 GROUP BY SELL_CD, TYPE_NO ORDER BY TYPE_NO,SELL_NM
